Package maze

Class MazeContext

java.lang.Object
maze.MazeContext
public class MazeContext
extends java.lang.Object
MazeContext gathers constants and methods useful for developpers.

  • Method Details

    • newBox

      public static Box newBox​(int boxType, int[] args) throws InvalidBoxArgumentsException, UnexpectedBoxTypeException
      Construcs a new box with given type and arguments.
      Parameters:
      boxType - type of the box to be built.
      args - array of arguments to be given the constructor.
      Returns:
      A new box, if given type is 0, then returns null.
      Throws:
      InvalidBoxArgumentsException - if box constructor could not parse the arguments.
      UnexpectedBoxTypeException - if given type does not match any.

    • getNbArgs

      public static int getNbArgs​(int boxType) throws UnexpectedBoxTypeException
      Returns the number of arguments for a given box type.
      Parameters:
      boxType - type of the box to be searched.
      Returns:
      The number of arguments necessary to build the box type.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedBoxTypeException - if given type does not match any.

    • getBoxType

      public static java.lang.Integer getBoxType​(java.lang.String str)
      Converts a box type from string to integer.
      Parameters:
      str - the string box type.
      Returns:
      An Integer corresponding, or null if the string does not match any type.

    • getFlag

      public static BoxFlag getFlag​(java.lang.String str)
      Converts a flag from string to integer.
      Parameters:
      str - the string flag.
      Returns:
      An flag corresponding, or null if the string does not match any flag.
